export function formatDateToDDMMYYYY(date){if(!date||!(date instanceof Date))return null;var day=String(date.getDay()).padStart(2,'0');var month=String(date.getMonth()+1).padStart(2,'0');// Months are zero-indexed
var year=date.getFullYear();return"".concat(day,".").concat(month,".").concat(year);}
